readable.title: 2857372127_d86639002c
readable.content: A man and a woman in hats near a flight of stairs . A man in a brown hat and bow-tie with a woman in a red flower hat . A man wearing a gray hat stands with a woman wearing a red hat . A man with facial hair and a hat stands next to a woman in a red hat in front of a staircase . The man and woman are outside and something is drawing their attention .
